page.title: 18Housing
page.content: HOUSING Down our road there are detached, semi-detached and terraced houses.On one side the houses don't have anything in front.On this side the houses are well looked after.The houses opposite have small front gardens.On these houses the paint is dirty and peeling off.Mostly old people live there.One house at the bottom of the road has just been restored.Most of them have a small back garden or yard.Running along the back is a dirty alley.Most of the houses are quite old.The terraced ones are a bit older than the ones on our side.Some of the houses in our road have been altered with new windows and doors put in or kitchen extensions built.In the last year three or four old ladies have died and their houses have been sold. (Emma)
